document.full_text: to combat money laundering and contain the drug war raging along the u.s.-mexico border, u.s. authorities are seeking technology to detect the hoards of cash that smugglers try to spirit abroad.
document.title: u.s. chases elusive currency-detection technology
lines_and_colors: to combat money laundering and contain the drug war raging along the u.s.-mexico border, u.s. authorities are seeking technology to detect the hoards of cash that smugglers try to spirit abroad.
